channel.title: [508]Fixing Xlog[508]

If you don't find anything try searching
[code] You have run out [/code]

[code] if(disconnected[0] && !usedLogout && attackedBy != null) [/code]
right under that add
[code] logoutTimer = 60; [/code]
then the whole code should look like this
[code] } if(disconnected[0] && !usedLogout && attackedBy != null) logoutTimer = 60; else if(disconnected[0] && !usedLogout && attackedBy == null && logoutTimer == 0) { try { [/code]
